Name: Jo-Jo Hamm
Description:
Jo-Jo was found slumped dead in a car. She had been shot three times.

> Impersonator Found Shot To Death In Car (St. Louis Post-Dispatch, MO, USA, 1970-06-21)
>
> Joseph (Jo-Jo) Hamm, a female impersonator, was found shot to death at 7:30 a.m. yesterday in an automobile in the 1800 block of Piggott Avenue, East St. Louis.
>
> [She] was 30 years old and lived at 618 North Sixth Street, East St. Louis.
>
> Hamm was wearing women's clothing when [she] was shot three times and left in the car. A woman walking past saw the body slumped across the seat and went to the nearby home of a security guard. He returned to the car with her and then telephoned police. 
>
> Deputy Coroner John Kassly said the victim apparently had been dead for several hours.

https://www.newspapers.com/article/st-louis-post-dispatch-murder-of-transg/77725901/
Tweet:
Jo-Jo Hamm  was found dead in a car in St. Louis, Missouri (USA) on 19 Jun 1970. She had been shot three times.

She was 30. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR
